readme_content:
# 💫 Sobre mí: 🌟 **Adrián Martínez** - Desarrollador Frontend

Bienvenido a mi perfil de GitHub. Soy desarrollador frontend especializado en la creación de interfaces web modernas, accesibles y optimizadas para ofrecer experiencias de usuario de alta calidad. Mi enfoque combina una sólida base técnica con principios de diseño centrados en el usuario. 🚀

📫 **Correo de contacto**: [theamr91@gmail.com](mailto:theamr91@gmail.com) --- ## 🌐 Redes sociales: [![LinkedIn](https://img.shields.io/badge/LinkedIn-%230077B5.svg?logo=linkedin&logoColor=white)](https://linkedin.com/in/adri%C3%A1n-mart%C3%ADnez-ruiz-a8b74b2b4/) --- --- # 💻 Tech Stack: ### adriandcoding/modulo-3-Bundling-Laborato.summary: Extensive refactoring of the project's webpack configuration was performed on 2025-01-20, resulting in improved build and development processes. This included the addition of environment-specific settings and the removal of unused configuration files.

adriandcoding/Modulo-2-Laboratorio-Lengu.summary: Significant updates to the project were made on 2025-01-19 and 2025-01-18, focusing onImproved coding practices, such as removing unnecessary comments, refactoring functions for clarity and type safety, and simplifying object typing in TypeScript code.

profile_summary: As a frontend developer specialized in creating modern, accessible, and optimized web interfaces, I combine technical expertise with user-centered design principles to deliver high-quality user experiences. With a strong foundation in TypeScript, JavaScript, and HTML, I've developed a passion for crafting innovative and efficient interfaces through my 12 public repositories. I'm excited to collaborate with like-minded professionals on projects that push the boundaries of what's possible in the world of web development.
